document_name: UNDP Swaziland CO DRM project FINAL (2).doc

outputs.output_descr: The project will assist in building the capacity for the Government of Swaziland to establish decentralized structures for disaster risk management.  It will also strengthen structures responsible for emergency preparedness and response at all levels; national, regional and community to mitigate and put in place early recovery intervention to reduce the effects of disasters.

project_descr: Strengthening National and Community Systems for Effective Disaster Risk Management
project_title: Strengthening National and Community DRR System
